title: The Stargazer and the Apple of Envy
narrative_text: Leo spent his evenings sketching constellations, dreaming of owning the new "Stargazer 5000" telescope (望远镜). He imagined exploring nebulae, feeling the vastness of space. Then, one sunny afternoon, he watched his neighbor, Chloe, unbox the very same model, a gift from her enthusiastic aunt. A sharp, uncomfortable pang of jealousy (嫉妒) twisted in Leo's stomach. Why her? He felt an unfairness that clouded his usual cheerful demeanor.Days later, strolling past Chloe’s yard, Leo spotted a perfect, glossy red apple (苹果) nestled amongst fallen leaves, clearly having rolled from her picnic basket. His initial thought, still shadowed by envy, was to keep it. "She has the telescope, I'll take her apple," a childish voice echoed. But something held him back; a flicker of his better judgment. The following morning, Leo overheard Chloe explaining to her parents that the "Stargazer" had a critical lens defect. They were making arrangements for a full refund (退款). Her voice held genuine disappointment. Hearing this, Leo's petty jealousy evaporated, replaced by empathy. He walked over, apple in hand. "This fell from your basket," he offered, a genuine smile finally replacing his resentment. Chloe thanked him, and they started discussing their shared love for the night sky, realizing connection was more fulfilling than envy.
key_sentence: Leo learns that empathy and shared passion are more rewarding than jealousy over material possessions.
illustration_prompts: Leo looking longingly at a starry night sky, sketches of constellations scattered around him, perhaps a catalog for the "Stargazer 5000" telescope open on his lap.
Chloe excitedly unboxing a new, sleek telescope in her sunlit backyard, while Leo watches from his window with a conflicted expression of envy.
A vibrant red apple lying on green grass near a fence, with Leo's hand reaching towards it, his face showing internal struggle.
Leo and Chloe looking up at the night sky together, perhaps pointing, the faulty telescope visible but not the focus, a sense of shared wonder.
moral_or_takeaway: Envy often stems from a misunderstanding of others' situations and can be overcome by empathy and shared interests.
